metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27818 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the check_chunk_name() function of pngcheck-2.4.0. Anattacker able to pass a malicious file to be processed by pngcheck couldcause a temporary denial of service, posing a low risk to applicationavailability.

criterions.comment: pngcheck: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
